p: As shown in Table 1, the RH 0 was negatively correlated with the monthly number of HFRS cases in Changchun. During the previous month, the monthly number of HFRS cases was negatively correlated with the RH 1 but positively correlated with the MWV 1. During the previous 2 months, the monthly HFRS cases were negatively correlated with the MT 2, MinT 2, MaxT 2, RH 2, and AP 2. During the previous 3 months, the monthly HFRS cases were negatively correlated with the MT 3, MinT 3, MaxT 3, AP 3, and SD 3. During the previous 4 months, the monthly numbers of HFRS cases were negatively correlated with the MT 4, MinT 4, MaxT 4, AP 4, and SD 4. During the previous 5 months, the monthly number of HFRS cases was negatively correlated with the MT 5, MinT 5, MaxT 5, and SD 5. During the previous 6 months, the monthly number of HFRS cases was negatively correlated with the SD 6.
